bug.author: LittleFatHero
bug.summary: can't install mxnet through pip install command
bug.description:
os: ubuntu 18.04 python: 3.6 problem : When I install mxnet-cu101 using the following command: <denchmark-code>pip install mxnet-cu101 </denchmark-code>
I can't install, it said the Hash values do not match. I change another computer and network, there is still the same problem. I guess it is because the update of the mxnet and cause the software source error. please fix the problem as soon as possible. the following is the error informationï¼š <denchmark-code>ERROR: THESE PACKAGES DO NOT MATCH THE HASHES FROM THE REQUIREMENTS FILE. If you have updated the package versions, please update the hashes. Otherwise, examine the package contents carefully; someone may have tampered with them. mxnet-cu101 from https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/packages/57/aa/474e97edaa2064c4e57dfb5685290ffc188592878c8bc58a1dca770872b5/mxnet_cu101-1.5.1.post0-py2.py3-none-manylinux1_x86_64.whl#sha256=5eb6f1ba3ad76f39cfb980848065b65af509dcd7b48a2cb3c62a622baf961022: Expected sha256 5eb6f1ba3ad76f39cfb980848065b65af509dcd7b48a2cb3c62a622baf961022 Got c26a55c4d5b85a0f8f69b42887d6006b3bfd9db216a8780086735106dbee5315 </denchmark-code>

comments.comment: There seem to be frequent problems with the tsinghua mirror. Another user reported similar problems earlier this month. Please use a different mirror or the original pypi repo.

In particular, you can download the file here: <denchmark-link:https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/57/aa/474e97edaa2064c4e57dfb5685290ffc188592878c8bc58a1dca770872b5/mxnet_cu101-1.5.1.post0-py2.py3-none-manylinux1_x86_64.whl>https://files.pythonhosted.org/packages/57/aa/474e97edaa2064c4e57dfb5685290ffc188592878c8bc58a1dca770872b5/mxnet_cu101-1.5.1.post0-py2.py3-none-manylinux1_x86_64.whl</denchmark-link>
